page.title: 07INDUSTRY AND TRADE PT.2.
page.content: Unemployment in the area is below the current average. A relatively large proportion of locally resident workers travel outside the area to the nearby {Matthews Turkey}processing plant or one of the two major building firms, {Denny & Duncan & Son}who serve a large part of the surrounding area. There is little new building in Southwold itself. A smaller proportion travel into the area to work. The{Southwold Hospital}provides additional jobs of both professional and ancilliary nature. The fishing industry continues to decline but a number of older local residents are still engaged in small boat activities.An unusual component of the holiday trade is to be found in the large number of continental vistors who arrive in their own boats.
